text: Sunder Shiam (born 5 July 1930) is an Indian wrestler. He competed in the men's freestyle featherweight at the 1960 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:Possibly living people Category:Indian male sport wrestlers Category:Olympic wrestlers of India Category:Wrestlers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Amritsar
title: Sunder Shiam
